live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
56246.summary: Some customers in the South Portage area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
56246.title: Dec 18 - Winnipeg (South Portage) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
